prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with intricate wing patterns and a vibrant color scheme.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a butterfly, with an elegant design and bright colors.
Imagine a Pokemon inspired by insects, featuring large, colorful wings and a unique body shape.
Generate a creature with a delicate appearance, combining blue and orange hues in its design.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing a blend of beauty and agility.
Design a Pokemon that embodies grace and charm, with vivid colors and a captivating silhouette.
Give me a Pokemon with a dual bug/flying type, reflecting the beauty of nature in its colors.
